data.eml:eml: Two new species of Hilara (Diptera, Empididae) from northwestern Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Çiftçi, Mustafa Cemal, Hasbenli, Abdullah (2011): Two new species of Hilara (Diptera, Empididae) from northwestern Turkey. Zootaxa 2928: 49-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208076
